chatbot.controller

Class ChatbotAppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatbot.controller.ChatbotAppController

  • public class ChatbotAppController
extends java.lang.Object
    Runs the Chatbot Project. Owns the model and associated views
    Version:
    1.2 10/2/14 - cleaned the quit method.
    Author:
    Zac Conder
